text: Schoolâ€™s discipline gotten worse after most of the good teachers left. 2024 P6 sports carnival was terrible. The person who organised the sports carnival gave all the teachers in charge refreshing drinks while we boys get nothing but water despite our effort in the sports carnival. This school is so damn terrible as there are tons of bullying cases about boys pushing each other into the pond (they added barriers but there is still a little gap at the pond area, which boys might be pushed or shoved in there.) There are also no toilet paper in the toilets unlike St Patrickâ€™s School. Some of the teachers care about the discipline drop ðŸ“‰, but the other teachers do not and be lazy. My Primary 4 Science teacher, Mrs Tan Lee Huang, was caught slacking on her job and got fired but rehired by the school. How is the school going to trust her? I also suffered for 2-3 years in this school through bullying.

Amazing school environment, there was good SMM ( Safe Management Measures) between students' seating arrangements. Staffs are polite and friendly. Really like how the school places a strong emphasis on the Catholic faith and values for the boys to serve. The weekly online Rosary session is great for boys to learn how to pray. Kudos to the school.

The school discipline has gotten worse since p1 during p1 it was very tight now the teachers don't  care a lot and some teachers are unfair and unreasonable.the best teachers have left like Mr Paul  chew and mdm noraini
Former student here. Its ok but some teachers when I was there were kind of insane. Otherwise its ok but the facilities aren't the best. At least the students are not gangsters like those ACS people
The school discipline system does not send naughty students into detention or place them on a temporary suspension. They only let out a warning to these students.
